game.name: Neighbor Master
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 온라인 협동, Steam 도전 과제, 카메라 움직임 조정, 음량 개별 조정, 키보드 전용 옵션, 마우스 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, 스테레오 사운드, 서라운드 사운드, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Your neighbor just bought a SPORTS CAR. You? You're broke. But you have a shovel and a backyard full of... opportunity. Dig, melt, and bottle snow to build a "Premium Glacier Water" empire. Send in the drones, upgrade your gear, and save up for a ride that will make his car look like a cheap toy.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Your neighbor just bought a SPORTS CAR. You? You're broke. But you have a shovel and a backyard full of... opportunity. Dig, melt, and bottle snow to build a "Premium Glacier Water" empire. Send in the drones, upgrade your gear, and save up for a ride that will make his car look like a cheap toy.
